items.sentence: Admitting there is a problem is the first step to solving the problem.
Tom read the book so many times that the binding started coming apart.
Do you think that men talk about women more than women talk about men?
Tom is a terrible joke teller, because he often forgets the punchline.
In those days, black children didn't go to school with white children.
To be honest, it's hard for me to understand why you want to go there.
Tom and his friends had a snowball fight against Mary and her friends.
I doubt that Tom has ever read a book from cover to cover in his life.
I could tell by the look on Tom's face that he knew what was going on.
Tom asked Mary whether she wanted to go shopping with him after lunch.
